Series III. Advertising Sales: Director of Market Planning Robert Schreiber Files
Series III. Advertising Sales: Director of Market Planning Robert Schreiber Files

Robert Schreiber's files range from his roles in Corporate Research and at Sports Illustrated, but were filed together. The materials are analysis memoranda from Schreiber and reports and studies from outside firms.

Robert Schreiber was appointed Director of Market Planning for Sports Illustrated (SI) in September 1970. Prior he was in Corporate Marketing and Economic Research. He held the SI role through 1981 before moving into the Magazine Group research department. The department head lists no longer list him after 1985.
Time Inc. Reference Files, MS 3009-RG 3, New-York Historical Society
